name: Arghya Bhagwat
experience: Hey! I'm Arghya, a 4th year architecture student, passionate about designing and representing spaces that improve people's lives. I believe architecture as both a force and an opportunity to transform how we live, integrating design, functionality, culture, context and sustainability. With a collaborative and analytical mindset, I strive to create with an innovative vision and a commitment to positive impact of my projects on the environment.
